# 恋爱诡计

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/lianai-guiji
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/lianai-guiji
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install lianai-guiji
lianai-guiji <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g lianai-guiji
lianai-guiji <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
